content: FYI - I went to town on the rabbit hole analysing whether if there is an issue to begin with and what the issue really might be is consider there are existing mechanisms for it that should perfectly work fine - https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io/discussions/4503#discussioncomment-2054981

I also thought under separate issue that it would be pretty beneficial to create a crates.io optimised consumer SDK crate that would have benefits to crates.io itself in various aspects under different consumer pattern / volumes - https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io/discussions/4505
